list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an unexpected or astonishing event, fact, or thing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the announcement was a complete surprise
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thông báo là một bất ngờ hoàn toàn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting a class of complex methods of change-ringing.
(of something unexpected) cause (someone) to feel mild astonishment or shock.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I was surprised at his statement
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã ngạc nhiên về tuyên bố của mình
